HomePage.introduction2: a passionate web developer who strives to improve and learn new things each day.
HomePage.zeetaaDescription: Experience Zeetaa: a dynamic social app with robust user interaction, seamless authentication, MongoDB-driven search, real-time chat, and notifications. Designed with CSS/HTML styling by my partner and NextJS backend by me, it also features a bonus translation option in English or Japanese for global inclusivity.
HomePage.gamiplexDescription: Enter the world of Gamiplex: a web app for discovering, adding, and sharing favorite games. Boasting user authentication, CRUD capabilities, and a seamless game search using RAWG API, with MongoDB handling user data, NextAuth ensuring authentication, and Prisma for efficient database queries.
HomePage.iFindGalleryDescription: Discover the magic of iFindGallery, a web app powered by the Unsplash API for seamless image searches. Explore images by name, view in full size, download with a click, and dive deeper into the artist's world by accessing their portfolio page â€“ all in one captivating platform.
HomePage.iMoviFDescription: iMoviF is a web application that allows users to search for movies. It uses the TMDB API to fetch movies respectively. It also has a search function that allows users to search for movies by name and view the movie's details. You can also view the movie's trailer. on top of that, you can also view the movie's actor and see movie that they also acted on.
HomePage.longIntroduction1: Greetings, I'm Takish from the Philippines and currently lives in Japan. My unweavering passion drives me to continually enchance my skills and embrace new challenges each day. I'm dedicated to personal growth and constantly striving to expand my knowledge in the field of web development.
HomePage.longIntroduction2: In my leisure time, I find enjoyment in watching anime, particularly One Piece, Engaging with anime not only provides entertainment but also serves as a valuable tool for enhancing my Japanese language skills.
HomePage.name: Lim Takish
HomePage.description: Portfolio of Lim Takish, a passionate web developer who strives to improve and learn new things each day.

AboutMePage.heading: About Me
AboutMePage.introduction1: Hello, I'm Takish from the Philippines, currently living in Japan. I started having interest in web development when I was in second year of senior high school and started learning it when I was in college. I'm currently studying at College of Bussiness and Communication, majoring in Global ICT Course.
AboutMePage.introduction2: I'm always looking forward to learn new things and be better than myself yesterday. I'm currently learning testing with Vitest and React Testing Library on top of that, I'm also learning tRPC while building Budgetplex to apply what I've learned. I'm interested in learning back-end technologies such as PHP with Laravel and SQL before I graduate college.
AboutMePage.introduction3: In my leisure time, I find enjoyment in watching anime, particularly One Piece, Engaging with anime not only provides entertainment but also serves as a valuable tool for enhancing my Japanese language skills.
AboutMePage.introduction4: I also enjoy playing video games, particularly Valorant, Elden Ring, Valehim and my favorite, Minecraft. I've been playing Minecraft since 2012 and I'm still playing it until now. I also enjoy playing Valorant with my friends and I beat Elden Ring, have 100% completion at it.
AboutMePage.introduction5: I've also started working out this year solely for the purpose of being healthy, improving my strength, look good, and improve improve brain function and memory.
AboutMePage.update: I've just passed the JLPT N2 this year and I'm currently focusing on my Kanji and Vocabulary.
AboutMePage.todolist1: Learn Testing with Vitest, and React Testing Library.
AboutMePage.todolist3: Buiding Budgetplex while applying the things I've learned in testing and tRPC.
AboutMePage.goal1: Build Gamiplex, a web application that allows users to discover, add and share their favorite games with CRUD functionality.
AboutMePage.goal2: Learn how to test React and NextJS applications with Vitest and React Testing Library.
AboutMePage.goal3: Build Zeetaa, a social media application that allows users to share what they're up to and interact with other users.
AboutMePage.goal4: Learn deeper about Git and Github.
AboutMePage.goal5: Learn tRPC for efficient data fetching and management.
AboutMePage.goal6: Build Budgetplex, a budgeting application that allows users to track their expenses and income.
AboutMePage.goal7: Build Jobplex, a job board application that allows users to post jobs and apply for jobs.
AboutMePage.goal8: Learn how to use Stripe API for payment.
AboutMePage.goal9: Build Foodplex, a food delivery application that allows users to order food from different restaurants.
AboutMePage.goal10: Build Buyplex, an e-commerce application that allows users to buy and sell products.
AboutMePage.description: Learn more about Lim Takish, a passionate web developer who strives to improve and learn new things each day.

ContactPage.description: If you have any questions or want to work with me, feel free to contact me.
